name: Wild potion
description: Upong drinking this potion, you feel a bit dizzi...

name: Frostfire tear
description: Enemies shall be frozen in time while burning.

name: Moonlit Quill
description: Used to create contracts with magical beings.

name: Elixir of Ember
description: A fiery potion that temporarily increases fire resistance and attack power.

name: Seal of the Ancients
description: A sigil of immense power that locks or unlocks ancient doors and forbidden areas.

name: Songbird Emblem
description: A token of alliance with the Sky Guardians. Grants access to aerial transportation.

name: Leaf of Rebirth
description: A glowing leaf that instantly restores health and cures poison.

name: Flame Glyph
description: An enchanted symbol that unleashes a devastating burst of fire when casted.

name: Crystal of Dew
description: A rare crystal formed from the first morning dew, used for crafting powerful water-based spells.

name: Codex of Whispers
description: An ancient book that reveals secrets of the forgotten world. Enhances intelligence and unlocks hidden paths.

name: Tome of Eternity
description: An enchanted book containing endless knowledge. When read, it grants insight into ancient secrets and boosts wisdom temporarily.

name: Sphere of the Seer
description: A mystical globe used by oracles to glimpse into possible futures. It emits a faint glow when a significant event is near.

name: Starshard Beacon
description: A fragment of a fallen star. When activated, it creates a radiant pulse that illuminates the surroundings and wards off shadows.

name: Spirit of the Sky
description: A spectral entity that aids adventurers - grants temporary flight and enhanced perception in high altitudes.

name: Crest of the Verdant Order
description: A symbol of allegiance to the druids of the Eternal Grove. Grants increased affinity with nature-based spells.

name: Flame of the Trinity
description: A sacred artifact used in ancient ceremonies. The three flames represent balance, unity, and power. Amplifies magical rituals.

name: Idol of the Forgotten Wizard
description: A figurine representing an ancient and powerful sorcerer, long lost to time. Its presence fills the air with arcane energy and boosts magical abilities while slowly drains the user's stamina.
